title: Name Change
body: yo so i'm trying to change my name to hi im grape but the game wont let me? i checked and theres nobody with the name and it doesnt seem to break any rules?

replies.body: The name itself has a word in there that may be filtered.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll try to manually change the name for you.  Just be sure to have the required amount of currency to provide the name change.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!

It's probably because "Grape" contains "rape." :(

This is a similar reason why your name can't have "Assassin" or "Grass" in it, because those words contain "ass."
somebody has the name Grape tho?
Nothing with Grape in it works whats goin on here :(
